author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black announce engagement via The Times
text:
Congrats are in order for Olympic diver Tom Daley and his director, screenwriter, film and television producer partner - Mr. Dustin Lance Black; they've just announced their engagement via The Times. It's the one under the one involving a countess of Cardigan.
Congrats to @TomDaley1994 and @DLanceBlack who announced their engagement in the Times today âÂÂÂÂ¤ï¸ÂÂÂÂâÂÂÂÂ¤ï¸ÂÂÂÂ pic.twitter.com/65vzolRgB0
— Kimberley Dadds (@KimberleyDadds) October 1, 2015 Dustin, who won an Oscar thanks to his involvement with Milk in 2008 has been dating the diver for over two years, and the pair share an apartment together in London.
Daley announced he was gay via a video message, in which he said he "still likes girls" but - despite that - he's now officially off the market. Sorry ladies.
Via Sky News
